items.title: Crypto Natives
items.description: This group consists of experienced users who are heavily involved in the crypto space. They value security, efficiency, and advanced features to manage their assets. Vultisig's multi-chain capabilities and institutional-grade security appeal to them

items.title: Funds
items.description: Investment funds require robust security measures to safeguard their assets. Vultisig offers an open-source, audited alternative to traditional custodians, allowing these funds to manage their investments securely and efficiently while maintaining self-custody.

items.title: Treasuries
items.description: Organizations holding large amounts of crypto need a secure way to manage their funds. Vultisigâ€™s transaction policies and multi-signature features allow treasuries to delegate access safely, set spending limits, and ensure accountability.

items.title: Whales
items.description: Individuals or entities holding significant amounts of cryptocurrency are prime targets for Vultisig. They face higher risks of theft and loss and would benefit from Vultisig's secure vault system and multi-factor authentication to protect their substantial investments

items.title: Developers
items.description: Developers interested in creating decentralized applications (dApps) can leverage Vultisigâ€™s SDK to build and deploy AI-powered tools within the wallet. The ability to create custom plugins enhances the wallet's functionality and user experience.

items.title: DeFi Enthusiasts
items.description: Users engaged in decentralized finance will appreciate Vultisig's integration with DeFi protocols for portfolio management, staking, and automated trading. The wallet simplifies complex DeFi interactions, making it accessible to a wider audience.

items.title: Retail Investors
items.description: Casual investors looking for a user-friendly interface to manage their crypto assets will find Vultisig appealing, as it offers a seamless experience without the need for complicated seed phrases or hardware wallets.

items.title: Institutional Investors
items.description: Larger investment firms and institutions are increasingly looking at crypto investments. Vultisigâ€™s institutional-grade security and auditability can help these investors manage their assets with confidence in a rapidly evolving market.

features.title: All the Tools in One App

items.title: Seedless
items.description: Experience unprecedented safety with Vultisig's seedless vaults. No more seed phrases to memorize or loseâ€”your assets are secured through unique vault shares across your trusted devices.

items.title: Multi-Chain
items.description: Manage all your digital assets in one place! Vultisig supports multiple chains like Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana, making it the ultimate multi-chain solution for crypto enthusiasts.

items.title: AI-Automation
items.description: Transform your wallet into a smart assistant! With AI-powered agents and plugins, automate tasks like portfolio rebalancing and risk management, ensuring your assets are always optimized.

items.title: Fast Transactions
items.description: Enjoy seamless transactions with lightning-fast signing times. Vultisig's unique design allows for real-time confirmations across devices, making crypto management effortless and secure.

items.title: Rewards
items.description: Holding $VULT isn't just about ownership; it's about benefits! Earn rewards from transaction fees and gain access to exclusive features within the Vultisig ecosystem, enhancing your crypto experience.

items.title: User-Centric
items.description: Say goodbye to clunky interfaces! Vultisig offers a rich, user-friendly experience that puts you in control of your assets with easy navigation and clear information at your fingertips.

kols.title: Every Step of the Way with Kols

items.name: Introducing $VULT: The Economic Engine
items.description: We designed $VULT to be more than just another token; it's the backbone of Vultisigâ€™s AI-powered self-custody ecosystem. Holding $VULT provides staking rewards, access to AI automation, and governance rights, creating real value for the community.

items.name: Revolutionizing Wallets with AI
items.description: Vultisig is launching an AI-powered plugin system that allows users to install custom AI tools in their wallets. This upgrade transforms traditional wallets into intelligent systems that automate trades, prevent scams, and enhance risk management.

items.name: Preventing Mistakes in Web3 Security
items.description: In the volatile world of Web3, one mistake can lead to significant losses. Vultisig is developing AI-driven security tools designed to prevent errors before they happen, ensuring that self-custody remains safe and stress-free for all users.
